title: Bachelor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, attack someone and clean them. If you succeed, lose access to this ability and choose three players' houses to bury evidence at. *You can't choose Peasants.*

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When players visit your house or any house where evidence is buried at, they are notified they "found human remains" caused by this role. If the town finds at least two houses with human remains, you receive the death penalty the following night.
- When it no longer becomes possible to find enough evidence to convict you, you win. (ex: all players whose houses you've buried evidence at have died. It is no longer possible for the town to find two houses with evidence - therefore you win.)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
